content.rendered:
Spoil a loved one with our decadent collection of Loco Love chocolates. Featuring a tempting variety of flavours and textures that are sure to tantalise the taste buds, where each chocolate bar offers a unique experience. Pair these exquisite treats with your flower purchase to elevate the gifting experience, and create a memorable treat for any occasion.

Handmade in the picturesque coastal town of Byron Bay , nestled on the far-north coast of New South Wales. Loco Love feature 100% natural ingredients, are organic, vegan, soy and refined sugar free, gluten free, and support 100% sustainably sourced cocoa. With chocolate that offers benefits beyond just taste, we’re confident you’ll notice and enjoy the difference.

Presented in our signature gift bag and trailing ribbon.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
